message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500.

I understand that you have a budget constraint, Bob. However, I'm confident that this product will bring you significant value in the long run. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $11000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $10750.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10625.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. My final counteroffer is $10900.
Considering our negotiations, I believe a fair counteroffer would be $10800.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000, Bob. I've already compromised significantly. My final counteroffer is $11000, and I'm not budging from this price. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.
